attachments.title: Cannot load registered type library · Issue #5738 · vim/vim
attachments.text: If I get this file: <https://github.com/vim/vim-win32-installer/releases/download/v8.2.0357/gvim_8.2.0357_x86.zip> and start gvim.exe, I get this message: Vim Initialisation Cannot load registered ty...
